title: Supreme Court stays criminal proceedings against IREO, Oberoi top brass
description: Challenging the Punjab and Haryana High Courtâ€™s order that upheld registration of an FIR, both IREO, and Oberoi group moved the Supreme Court alleging that Singh, the authorised representative of Advance India Projects (AIPL) did not disclose the first criminal proceeding where he got no relief and a second complaint was filed in a different police station.
